name: Shell Alvania Grease 0860
description: Special Grease for Steering Ball Joint Application

localDocs.name: Alvania 0860 United States EN 140002686046 EHS V5.0 10-MAR-2023

marketing: Shell Alvania Grease 0860 is an NLGI Grade 2 lithium 12-hydroxystearate -thickened grease, containing 1% molybdenum disulfide and a special polymer. It is especially formulated for production fill for  automotive ball joints.  It is designed to have excellent corrosion protection, extreme pressure properties, oxidation stability, mechanical stability and low friction performance.
